item.description:
Join us for dinner, drinks and good times with fun and friendly people. La Morra is known for its delicious Italian food and has been voted Best of Boston. Joint event with the New England 25+ Social Fun group.

Everyone pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000. It will be a great time, look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will be carrying a large red purse.
item.name: Dinner, Drinks and Fun Times at La Morra Restaurant, Brookline
